content:
Issue: Master Swap - Juf Roos

Description: Hi guys,

I have a question regarding a master swap.

They asked us to swap the master of ISRC NLP761800069, but this track is on more than 50 products.
Some products are live, others are released the next coming month.
I attached a list of the products to this email as well as the new master.

This means that we would have to download all the audio masters of every product and then swap them with the correct master.

Since this requires a lot of time and work, we were wondering if there is a faster way to do this?

Can you guys please look into this?

Thanks in advance!

Kind regards,

[Afbeelding met zwart, duisternis  Automatisch gegenereerde beschrijving]

Nick Bunckens (he/him)
Processing Manager
Sony Music Entertainment Belgium
sonymusic.be
<https://www.sonymusic.be/>
summary: Master Swap - Juf Roos

www.ibm.com

thank you all!

the account set up is done and the graphics have been uploaded.

cheers,
olivia

On Wed, 6 Nov 2024 at 11:16, Burgess, Fiona , Asbury Media <fiona.burgess.asburymedia@sonymusic.com<mailto:fiona.burgess.asburymedia@sonymusic.com>> wrote:
Hi Olivia,

Welcome to AOMA. The required information for the Google Authenticator, along with your AOMA account credentials, can be found below. Please follow the instructions below and let us know if you have any trouble.

1. Please download the Google Authenticator app for the Google Chrome browser at the link below. https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/gauth-authenticator/ilgcnhelpchnceeipipijaljkblbcobl/support

2. Next, proceed to the Google Authenticator app URL below.
http://gauth.apps.gbraad.nl/#main

3. Click the "Pencil" icon in the upper-right hand corner. Click "Add."

Account Name:  oliviarobinkurz@gmail.com<mailto:oliviarobinkurz@gmail.com>
Secret Key: You will receive your Secret Key in a second, separate email

4. Click "Add." You will be redirected to the main screen. You'll see your email address, along with a six-digit code, which will change every thirty seconds.

5. Next, go to the AOMA URL below.
https://aoma.smcdp-de.net/ (Please select the ‚Äúnon-employee‚Äù login button)

6. Log-in with the following credentials.

Username:  olikurz
Password: Test1234 (please note the upper-case T)
Additional Password: latest six-digit code from the Google Authenticator app

7. You will then be redirected to the Change Password screen. Please create a new password based upon the following criteria.

Minimum of 8 characters in length
The first character must be alphabetic

Contain characters from three of the following four categories:
English uppercase character (A through Z)
English lowercase character (a through z)
Digit (0 through 9)
Special character (for example, $, #, %)
You cannot reuse passwords which are identical to your earlier five (5) passwords.

8. Please enter your new password twice to confirm. You will then be redirected to the log-in screen.

Username:  olikurz
Password: new password from step 7 (ensure your browser didn't save an older password)
Additional Password: latest six-digit code from the Google Authenticator


Thanks,

Fiona
AOMA Support


This email originated from outside of Sony Music.  Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.

Resolution: Complete
summary: Re: Welcome To AOMA (Asset Offering and Management Application) - Olivia Kurz.

content:
Issue: Recent Issues registering products with UST

Description: Hi Team,

Let me show you guys the issues I've been having recently while registering with UST.

While registering correctly the cover of the product, I got this message when trying to do so with the audio file (in the same folder of the cover)
The audio was correct (in duration, resolution and depth)

[cid:image002.png@01DB2FAC.2D9E48B0]

This happened to me with two different products this week. I got around it by registering the products with Direct Upload. No issues there.
Just in case, before going to Direct Upload I tried to register both with my Desktop and Laptop with the same results

Another issue that I had last week registering with UST was with an album.
I set everything  as usual, because I've been using UST since the start with no issues, and the uploading somehow stalled (it's still uploading since  11/01)[cid:image003.png@01DB2FAD.A3243B70]

When I noticed that it was taking too long I decided to remove the created links in order to register via Direct Upload.
It won¬¥t let me, even there were no linked masters, Direct Upload didn't.work in that case.
As  the product was an urgent case, I solved it by creating both Masters (24 and 16bit) using Master Create and then linking the full masters to the product, which worked fine.

I don't know if these two issues are related. What puzzles me is that the covers register correctly.

Let me know if anybody else has experienced this

Best regards

Luis



[cid:image001.gif@01DB2FAB.364EAB40]

Luis Herman
Studio & Digital Operations
Sony Music Entertainment Argentina
Jos√© Antonio Cabrera 6027
C1414BHM Ciudad Aut√≥noma de Buenos Aires
 Argentina
summary: Recent Issues registering products with UST

Issue: Invitation to SME Box Enterprise - Hallie Swidler

Description: Hi Hallie,


We discovered that you created a free Box account for yourself sometime in the past, which must be converted to an Enterprise level account managed by Sony Music in order to use the system.





You have been invited as a managed seat, please log into your account to accept this invitation:

[cid:c2b8ab8d-77d8-4b55-a54c-73de4f3fe611]





Once you accept the invite by clicking on either the "Accept Invitation" logged into your existing Box Lite account, or the via the email link, you will be rolled into the enterprise.

Web Application Pop-up:

[cid:2334fc5b-27ef-43d1-b7bb-7a8f997ea406]

Email Invitation:

[cid:533af8af-1077-4829-9b0d-391f65088a46]

Should you run into 2FA issues when trying to accept the invitation into the Enterprise...  you must reach out to Box directly and request to disable the 2-Factor Authentication for your account.



Please go ahead and submit a ticket via https://support.box.com/hc/en-us/requests/new requesting to have 2FA disabled on your personal/free "Box Lite" account so you will be able to accept the invite into the SME Box Enterprise without running into the 2FA problem.




    Manuela Brice
   ============
Global Technology Consultant
    Digital Asset Management
[Created via e-mail received from: "Brice, Manuela, Asbury Media" <manuela.brice.asburymedia@sonymusic.com>]

Resolution: Fixed
summary: Invitation to SME Box Enterprise - Hallie Swidler

Issue: AOMA 2 Export and Short form Videos

Description: Hi AOMA User,

I hope this message finds you well! We wanted to let you know that if you are currently using the AOMA 2 Exports for Short form Videos (such as Local File Share, Direct Delivery, Self-Delivery, etc.), which will soon be decommissioned.

But don't worry! We've some AOMA 3 alternatives that are much simpler, faster and more streamlined:

Option 1 (Preferred): AOMA 3 Proxy Downloads
- If you need Full Video and Program Only Video in HD Resolution, please use the inline Proxy download option as shown below:

[cid:image001.png@01DB2BA9.2820D7B0]
[cid:image002.png@01DB2BA9.2820D7B0]


Option 2: AOMA 3 Source Download
- If you require the source quality asset, this is the download option for you:
[cid:image003.png@01DB2BAA.9D566080]

Option 3: AOMA 3 Export
- This option is ideal if neither Option 1 nor Option 2 works for you OR if you need to send the video to someone else. You can use AOMA 3 Export (Direct Mail Delivery OR Sony Ci).

Please be mindful when selecting vantage conversion IDs highlighted in red below. We recommend using FFMPEG conversion options unless you absolutely need the output in ProRes format, which is available only through Vantage conversions.



[cid:image004.png@01DB2BAA.9D566080] [cid:image005.png@01DB2BAA.9D566080]


If you have any questions or face any issues, please do not hesitate to let us know immediately. We're here to help!

Thanks,
Rohit

Resolution: Complete
summary: AOMA 2 Export and Short form Videos

SETUP EMAIL

PAAVO J√ÑRVI
THE DEUTSCHE KAMMERPHILHARMONIE BREMEN
HAYDN
London Symphonies Vol.2 Symphonies No. 94 "Surprise", No. 95, No. 98 & No. 99

‚ÄúLaughing with Haydn‚Äù
Paavo J√§rvi and the Deutsche Kammerphilharmonie Bremen continues the fascinating journey to explore Haydn‚Äôs masterpieces.

[image001.jpg]


ARTISTS

Paavo J√§rvi

The Deutsche Kammerphilharmonie Bremen (Die Deutsche Kammerphilharmonie Bremen)



TITLE

Haydn: London Symphonies Vol.2 Symphonies No. 94 "Surprise", No. 95, No. 98 & No. 99



RELEASE DATE ex. Japan

November 22, 2024



BASIC TIMELINE (all dates subject to change)

September 27              Forecast Order closes

November 13               Album and digital release in Japan

November 22              Album and digital release ex. Japan



ABOUT THE ALBUM
- This year, Paavo J√§rvi and the Deutsche Kammerphilharmonie Bremen (DKAM) has celebrated 20th year of collaboration, since J√§rvi assumed artistic director/principal conductorship of DKAM in 2004. They have been active in classical music scene and their fresh and innovative interpretation of Symphonic works by Beethoven, Schumann and Brahms among others have been praised in concert and as recordings worldwide.

- Their current recording project is Haydn‚Äôs London Symphonies (Nos.93-104), 12 masterworks composed specifically for London audience between 1791 and 1795. These 12 symphonies are the culmination of Haydn‚Äôs creative activity and sum up his matured symphonic writing for the orchestra. All of them were first performed during Haydn‚Äôs two prolonged stays in London and became the highlights of the city‚Äôs musical seasons. Recognizable nicknames like ‚ÄúSurprise‚Äù, ‚ÄúMiracle‚Äù, ‚ÄúThe Clock‚Äùwere instantly given to many of them.

- The first volume including Symphonies No. 101 ‚ÄúThe Clock‚Äù and No. 103 ‚ÄúDrum Roll‚Äù) was released in 2022, and hugely praise worldwide, including the Gramophone Magazine‚Äôs Orchestra of the Year in 2023, and ‚ÄúOrchestra of the Year‚Äù of Opus Klassik award in 2024

- The second volume of the cycle includes four symphonies, ultra-famous No. 94 ‚ÄúSurprise‚Äù named after the humous and shocking loud chord,  No. 95 , No. 98 and No. 99.

- Paavo J√§rvi has loved Haydn‚Äôs symphonies for a long time and considers them quite neglected in the shadows of Mozart and Beethoven. With DKAM and their absorption of historically informed practice, now is the perfect time for him to explore the world of Haydn, because ‚Äúon the surface his music can often appear brilliant yet facile. But there‚Äôs much more to it than that, like Mozart and Beethoven, it is much more complex and nuanced. This requires the kind of teamwork that can only be found in a group that thinks and breathes like a chamber music ensemble. (‚Ä¶‚Ä¶) With the Kammerphilharmonie it is one of our greatest joys to share in this amazing spirit. I hope when you hear our recording Haydn‚Äôs true greatness and genius will be readily apparent when you find yourself laughing with him.‚Äù

- As with all of the past albums of Paavo J√§rvi and DKAM, the recording sessions took place after they perform each symphony many times in concerts and absorbed even the subtlest nuances of the score. Produced by Philip Traugott and engineered by Jean-Marie Geijsen (Polyhimnia), the excitement and vividness of their performances are perfectly captured in minute detail.

Issue: Info: Sony GRPS: Downtime of DBSPBMG8, DBSPBMG2 and DBSPSME5 on 02-11-2024

Description: Hi All,

arvato datacenter will add memory to the linux blade which hosts DB Server DBSPBMG2, DBSPBMG8, DBSPSME5 (gtunxlnd11548 )
on forthcoming, Saturday, 02-11-2024 starting at 8:00am CET ( 3:00 am EDT).
Downtime will be 2 hours.

Affected server will be:
- DBSPBMG2 - European & Report replicate,
- DBSPBMG8 - Dig Exchange & ASIA replicate,
- DBSPSME5 - TransactionManager and AOMA GRPS replicate,

For the downtime, the listed db server will be shutdown.

Arvato Change request No is: C1000213200

Please stop all processes, reports, application accessing DBSPBMG2, DBSPBMG8, DBSPSME5 before 8:00am CET.

Thanks

Best
    Ingrid


Note: there is only a 5-hour time difference the week of October 27th as Germany goes off of daylight savings time on Sunday, October 27th and NY changes on Sunday, November 3rd.


Ingrid Pape
Senior Project Manager

Fiona

Subject: Re: UST Audio and cover art permissions.

Michael Catandella | Senior Director, Media Production Operations | office (‚Ä¢) 212.833.4897 | cell (‚Ä¢) 917.816.5010 | (‚Ä¢) michael.catandella@sonymusic.com<mailto:michael.catandella@sonymusic.com>

Sehr geehrte Kunden,
angeh√§ngt an diese Mail oder als Archivdatei auf dem Server  bekommen Sie zur Freigabe unter Umst√§nden PDF-Dateien. Diese sind durch den Workflow unserer Produktion erstellt. Wir bitten Sie, diese genauestens zu pr√ºfen und uns per Mail freizugeben. Bitte √ºberpr√ºfen Sie dabei auch die Zuordnung von Referenznummer und PDF-Dokument (Dateiname) um sicherzustellen, dass Inhalt und Bedruckung Ihrer Produktion √ºbereinstimmen. F√ºr eine verbindliche √úberpr√ºfung ist es erforderlich, Adobe Acrobat als Vollversion zu verwenden und die "√úberdruckenvorschau" einzuschalten. Bei Vinylproduktionen kann es durch die Hitzeeinwirkung bei der Pressung auf den Labeln zu Farbver√§nderungen kommen; das gilt auch bei Pantonefarben.
Dear Customer,
attached are PDF files for your approval. The files were created by the workflow of our production. We request that you examine them closely and send us your approval by e-mail. Please check also the pdf-document-file-name match the reference to assure that the content agree with your production order. It is, however, imperative that you use a full version of Adobe Acrobat and switch on the "Overprint Preview" function. For vinyls it might be possible that colors will change during production because of the influence of the hot vinyl.; this also applies to Pantonecolors.
________________________________



This email originated from outside of Sony Music.  Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.

content:
Issue: Re: Submitting videos into AOMA UST from Sony Ci

Description: Hi Leon,

Thanks for sharing this to Merlion

We‚Äôve been exploring UST a little bit, and there are 2 minor issue so far from us


  1.  Merlion hasn‚Äôt had access to Engineer > Unified Submission Tool. Could you please help give the access? User: gust001
  2.  We tried to search newly created video product: G010005396505P and it‚Äôs not valid. Why is it happen?

That‚Äôs from us so far. Hopefully we can use UST method very soon

Regards

From: Dufficy, Leon <leon.dufficy@sonymusic.com>
Sent: Friday, October 18, 2024 11:31 AM
To: Gusti, Merlion. Sony Music Indonesia <merlion.gusti@sonymusic.com>
Subject: Submitting videos into AOMA UST from Sony Ci

Hi Merlion,

Hope you‚Äôre doing well.

I‚Äôm reaching out because I‚Äôve noticed that your Shortform Video AOMA Request Jira tickets are being set up as full registration tickets with either a Ci or a Google drive link.  Did you know that if you upload the video file directly into AOMA UST  from Ci using the steps below, the video will be registered in AOMA before the video engineers perform a QC check? Additionally, a post-registration Jira ticket is automatically generated for the engineers to pick up. This approach benefits you by eliminating the need to manually create a Jira ticket, reducing the work required from the engineers, and significantly lowering the job costs.
(Rate card - https://wiki.smedigitalapps.com/wiki/display/ALEX/Global+Media+Production+Rate+Card).


Step 1: Search for the product in UST and click the Select File button in the Video tab.

[Image]

Step 2: Select the security groups you require and then ‚ÄòImport From Sony Ci‚Äô where you can select the video file you want to register from your territories workspace.

[Image]

Full step by step instructions and FAQs can be found here: https://wiki.smedigitalapps.com/wiki/display/ALEX/Unified+Submission+Tool+%28UST%29+-+Shortform+Video+Registration+-+AOMA

Also a UST SFV user guide is attached to this email, any questions though please reach out.

Regards,
Leon Dufficy | Manager ‚Äì Media Production & Operations ‚Äì Global Media Production
Sony Music Entertainment Ltd
100 Harris St | Pyrmont NSW | 2009
[A white background with black dots  Description automatically generated]

Resolution: Complete
summary: Re: Submitting videos into AOMA UST from Sony Ci

On 6 Sep 2024, at 13:57, Florian Gottschau <fgottschau@imagion.de<mailto:fgottschau@imagion.de>> wrote:

Hi Melanie,
as we received all materials in 25fps (PAL-standard) and we had no further information, all assets and disks we‚Äôre handled for PAL-release. For a concert-product, we cannot just change the speed of the concert, as the pitch would also change and pitch-up. So we need to do a standard conversion to keep the pitch the same, but the video will loose quality, but the audio is what is more important on a concert disc I assume.  Best thing would have been, if the concert had been filmed in NTSC from the beginning, if it should be released in NTSC.
A region-free disk in PAL (which also applies for the Blu-ray) should run on newer TV‚Äôs (mostly all HD-flat TV‚Äôs, but never on old tube-TV‚Äôs) and most players in NTSC-regions also, but there‚Äôs no guarantee that the disc will run for every customer. An NTSC-disc will run in PAL-regions. Another solution would be to produce a PAL and NTSC-disc for DVD and Blu-Ray, but that would make 4 discs in total for authoring and encoding.

Should we do a standard conversion for 200,-‚Ç¨ to change the concert to NTSC (picture quality won‚Äôt get better by doing this) and encode the NTSC-concert f√ºr DVD and BD? We also need new menus for DVD and BD then.

Best,
Florian

Description: Dear Sir or Madam,

I am Linh Pham's replacement in the TV promo. At the beginning of my internship, we requested the same access to the portal for my account that she had. That worked. However, it is not possible to send me old campaigns. If I want to send Linh's campaigns by email, they are always sent to her email address, which is no longer active. Is it possible to change everything that is sent to her account to me? Meaning everything she created, since I still need to access it.
Thank you in advance.

Ria

Issue: Promotional materials for TV and Radio

Description: Hello, my name is Jorge Jim√©nez and I am the programming director of the TV channel CDR Canal 2 and the radio station Best FM, both in Costa Rica.

I would like to respectfully ask if it is possible to request that I be included in the mailing list for Sony Music Digital Delivery promotional e-cards, in order to receive the materials more quickly, both audio and video, and to be able to program the songs as soon as they are sent.
Here we program Anglo music, Latin music, and K-Pop, so materials from those genres would be very useful for our media, which belong to the largest radio and TV group in the country.

I would appreciate it if this inclusion could be made, if possible, please let me know if you need an email address to send these materials or any other information. Thank you!

[FIRMA-DIGITAL-BEST-FM]

La divulgaci√≥n, distribuci√≥n, reproducci√≥n o utilizaci√≥n del contenido de esta comunicaci√≥n, ya sea total o parcialmente es estrictamente prohibida y puede dar lugar a responsabilidades legales.

Issue: AW: Welcome To AOMA - Kathrin L√ºmers // Secret Key

Description: Hi Keith, 

hi AOMA Support, 

 

for whatever reason, I can no longer get into the AOMA system because the Google Authenticator has deleted my account, or I have to enter the login. 

Unfortunately, I no longer have the ‚Äúsecret key‚Äù required for this. Is it possible to send me a new one?

 

Many thanks in advance, 

all the best, 

 

Kathrin

 

__________________________

Kathrin L√ºmers 

 

K√úHL PR
Nina Schulze Pellengahr
Behringstra√üe 16a
22765 Hamburg

Tel: 040 - 87 08 59 89
Mobil: 0175 - 82 41 552
Email:  kathrin.luemers@kuehlpr.de <mailto:kathrin.luemers@kuehlpr.de> 
Web:    www.kuehlpr.de <http://www.kuehlpr.de/> 

 

K√ºhl PR bei Instagram <http://www.instagram.com/kuehlpr> 

K√ºhl PR bei Facebook <http://www.facebook.com/KuehlPR>  

 

 

Von: Sony Music AOMA Support [mailto:aoma.support@sonymusic.com] 
Gesendet: Mittwoch, 22. September 2021 19:03
An: K√ºhl PR, Kathrin L√ºmers <kathrin.luemers@kuehlpr.de <mailto:kathrin.luemers@kuehlpr.de> >
Cc: Haucke, Florian, Sony Music Germany <florian.haucke@sonymusic.com <mailto:florian.haucke@sonymusic.com> >
Betreff: Welcome To AOMA - Kathrin L√ºmers

 

Hi Kathrin, 

 

Welcome to AOMA. The required information for the Google Authenticator, along with your AOMA account credentials, can be found below. Please follow the instructions below and let us know if you have any trouble. 

 

1. Please download the Google Authenticator app for the Google Chrome browser at the link below. 

 <https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/gauth-authenticator/ilgcnhelpchnceeipipijaljkblbcobl/support> https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/gauth-authenticator/ilgcnhelpchnceeipipijaljkblbcobl/support 

 

2. Next, proceed to the Google Authenticator app URL below. 

 <http://gauth.apps.gbraad.nl/#main> http://gauth.apps.gbraad.nl/#main 

 

3. Click the "Pencil" icon in the upper-right hand corner. Click "Add." 

 

Account Name:  <mailto:kathrin.luemers@kuehlpr.de> kathrin.luemers@kuehlpr.de

Secret Key: You will receive your Secret Key in a second, separate email

 

4. Click "Add." You will be redirected to the main-screen. You'll see your email address, along with a six-digit code, which will change every thirty seconds. 

 

5. Next, go to the AOMA URL below. 

 <https://aoma.smcdp-de.net/> https://aoma.smcdp-de.net/ (Please select the ‚ÄúNon-Employee‚Äù login button)

 

6. Log-in with the following information. 

 

Username: klumers

Password: Test1234 (please note the upper-case T) 

Additional Password: latest six-digit code from the Google Authenticator app 

 

7. You will then be re-directed to the Change Password screen. Please create a new password based upon the following criteria. 

 

Minimum of 8 characters in length 

First character must be alphabetic 

Contain characters from three of the following four categories: 

English uppercase character (A through Z) 

English lowercase character (a through z) 

Digit (0 through 9) 

Special character (for example !, $, #, %) 

You cannot reuse passwords which are identical to your previous five (5) passwords. 

 

8. Please enter your new password twice to confirm. You will then be redirected to the log-in screen. 

 

Username:  klumers

Password: new password that you've just created (please be sure that your browser didn't save an older password) 

Additional Password: latest six-digit code from the Google Authenticator 

 

Please let us know if you have any trouble logging-in, or if you have any questions concerning the workflow. We can schedule an online training session if you'd like more in depth instruction for uploading files to AOMA. 

 

Thanks,

 

Keith McCarthy
====================
Sony Music AOMA Support
 <mailto:aoma.support@sonymusic.com> aoma.support@sonymusic.com

content:
Issue: Re: Splendid

Description: Good day,

As a key player in the music industry I know that over the years, you have
heard and seen many catchy songs and phenomenal music videos, but this one
is liable to top them all! This beautiful melodic song will definitely
break boundaries and leave the world in pure musical bliss.

The singer has an undeniable music talent, beautiful distinctive voice, and
songs that  are compelling, hooky, lyrically touching and universally
appealing;  songs that will stand out anywhere in the world even if the
current music trend evolves in the future.


Several music experts who listened to thousands of music, digging deep into
the annals of history and exploring the sounds of the entire globe; have
the following to say;

 * " I'm quite amazed at BJ Sam's writing, vocal & musical prowess &
dexterity! ... As I've already stated, he is an extremely talented
musician/writer - the kind of guy who this world is just crying out to
hear, for he is a force to be reckoned with".~**DJ Paula Frost, Kane 103.7
FM**. *

‚ÄúHi BJ, Were you intending to reach Warner Chappell Music? You have reached
Warner Music Production Music - a division that focuses on a large
production music library we distribute around the world for sync to media.
If you are interested in a purchase of this material for our library, we
would be very interested. Please let us know. Thank you! ~*PAT WEAVER (WCPM
/ Head of Production). *

  ‚ÄúWhat a beautiful song to be circling the world! Watching, listening and
toe tapping from Oregon (USA.)‚Äù ~ *Cynthia Bauman*

 ‚ÄúThank you for reaching out to us at Sony Music Sweden. I think the songs
linked sounds good, but I firmly believe that you will be much better off
with a partnership in English speaking countries /territory.‚Äù ~*Patrik ‚ÄúDJ
Sleepy‚Äù Elofsson (Sony Music Sweden Senior A&R)*.

"What an emotive and powerful voice you have. Clearly talented." *~Steve
Williams, producer/engineer for Britney Spears, Eric Clapton, The Rolling
Stones}.*

* "What a most delightful sound! ... B.J. Sam has created a song that is
highly infectious - proving that he is an extremely talented
musician/writer! ... "Mon Amour" has to be one of the most perfectly
balanced songs that I have ever heard". ~**Wayout Radio UK Programmer**.*

* "Votre vid√©o clip "Mon amour" est accrocheur". ~ **Philippe Vanier,
responsable musique TV5MONDE France.*

‚ÄúI‚Äôve listened to your tracks and I think they are arranged, produced and
sung very well.*‚Äù *~ *Eugenio Vicedomini, Music Art Director at
Flippermusic Italy. *

‚ÄúThis is the most inspirational songs I‚Äôve ever received. Sometimes people
that make history long journey it very lonely ‚Ä¶ we need more people like
you in the world to keep inspiring others to be great‚Äù ~*Sentoria Green
Owner LIVE 105.5 Mobile Radio | Los Angeles, California | The Green Room
Radio Show. *

* ‚ÄúWe LOVE this song! We played it on The Basement Tapes with Nick & Bootsy
last night and would really like to hear more from BJ Sam!‚Äù ~**Bootsy,
K-KID 92.9fm Missouri USA*


Please BJ Sam owns the master and 100% right to all his music and needs a
management and a distribution company for all his songs.

kindly add to your playlist. I will be so glad if you kindly subscribe and
drop a comment

YouTube: https://youtu.be/ERHd3u8xp5w

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/album/7aHhvRKdkcysbnvcvrop3X

iTunes: http://itunes.apple.com/album/id1757836633?ls=1&app=itunes

Press release: https://eutoday.net/bj-sam-releases-mon-amour/

other Original Scores:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DMNuS7gMut0&list=OLAK5uy_m7dkyt89tNG0YEWpWjCmg2wn2JbCxb2fg&index=2
Drive link with MP3:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1-DMGe6S7J6abZS9vs4OLcJn0MoKoDjG3?usp=sharing

Dropbox with press release, artwork and MP3 files:
https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/xarvenbi2o97xtb8gd5hh/AFA2vpjV9_jLCPSI3NUjkLM?rlkey=ixhhhazk6mkbquujm6eenczb8&dl=0

For further information, email to bjsam@live.com,

connect with @bjsammusic on LinkedIn, Instagram, Twitter, Facebook.

Connect on LinkedIn  http://linkedin.com/in/bjsammusic
[Created via e-mail received from: splendeeds <splendeedsmusic@gmail.com>]

Resolution: Fixed
summary: Re: Splendid

Issue: Radio Promo Spain contact lost

Description: Hello,

This is Rafa Llorente, from the Spanish radio show Rocktopia Radio.
I've been playing Inside Out (probably my favorite label) and Century Media releases for 20 years so far. In the last months I stopped receiving links to the Promo Portal for media download.
Couple of weeks ago I tried to contact the Spanish person in charge of it for so many years, but I haven't got any reply so far. His name is Paco Fernandez. He has always been very reliable and helpful, therefore I have thought that could be some problem going on.¬†

Rocktopia is on the airwaves for twenty years so far. Nowadays, during its 21th season, it is being broadcasted by more than 15 FM and on-line stations all around Spain. I think Rocktopia still can be a good promo tool for your releases.
You can check out our podcast-website at¬†https://rocktopiaradio.wordpress.com/


I would really appreciate your response.
Thank you very much in advance.

Rafa
¬†___________________________________¬† ¬†Rafa LlorenteRocktopia radio

SPAIN¬†http://rocktopiaradio.wordpress.com¬†
[Created via e-mail received from: Rocktopia - Rafa Llorente <rocktopia_radio@yahoo.es>]
summary: Radio Promo Spain contact lost

Issue: Gonzo (circus) #183: Baby Volcano & Melissa Pons

Description: Gonzo (circus) #183:  Baby Volcano & Melissa Pons 

Bekijk online  (https://www.gonzocircus.com/?na=v&nk=24609-e8e9845c5f&id=1602) 

MUSIC.ART.MORE 

MUSIC.ART.MORE  (https://www.gonzocircus.com) Magazine | Online platform | Events 

Banner GC#183

Lieve Gonzo (circus)-nieuwsbrieflezer,¬† 

üéâEditie #183 van Gonzo (circus) is verschenen! 

In de nieuwe editie en online een uitgebreid labelreport van Ostinato Records , een muzieklabel dat compilaties uitbrengt van vergeten muziek uit landen die hebben geleden onder conflicten, rampen of kolonialisme. Verder interviews met de Guatemalteeks-Zwitserse Baby Volcano die een expressionistische mix maakt van hiphop, trap, club-sounds, latin en pop - en met de in Portugal gevestigde field recordist/ geluidsontwerper Melissa Pons die onlangs een nieuw album uitbracht over de cyclus van leven en dood. 


¬† 

En verder nieuw op de blog verslagen van het Conflux Festival in Rotterdam en het concert van The Ex in Paradiso in Amsterdam . 

üì¨¬† Wil je het nieuwe nummer ook in huis hebben? 

Bestel 'm snel via onze webshop 

-------------- 
Veel lees- en luisterplezier! 

Bestel nu  (https://www.gonzocircus.com/shop) 

Cover3D GC#183

In Gonzo (circus) #183 

Interview: Baby Volcano  (https://www.gonzocircus.com/blog/baby-volcano) 

‚ÄòZelf ben ik eigenlijk al een mix,‚Äô vertelt Lorena Stadelmann over haar Guatemalteekse roots en Zwitserse opvoeding. ‚ÄòAls ik denk aan mijn muziek, aan hoe mijn lichaam zich uit en hoe de muziek in mijn lichaam zit, dan is dat het allemaal: die mix.‚Äô Onder de naam Baby Volcano maakt Stadelmann een duistere en expressionistische mix van hiphop, trap, club-sounds, latin en pop. Als danser en performer brengt ze op geslaagde wijze beweging en stemwerk samen. Katrien Schuermans ging met haar in gesprek voor onze nieuwste editie.  (https://www.gonzocircus.com/blog/baby-volcano) 

Lees verder  (https://www.gonzocircus.com/blog/baby-volcano) 

¬† 

Interview: Melissa Pons  (https://www.gonzocircus.com/blog/melissa-pons) 

In haar veldopnamen probeert Melissa Pons via albums over wolven, gieren en aaseters de ‚Äòmeer-dan-menselijke‚Äô-wereld te vangen. Haar werk draait om onze complexe relatie tot die wereld. De afgelopen jaren heeft Pons geluiden over de wereld verkend, van de bossen in Brazili√´ en Zweden tot haar thuisland Portugal. Haar nieuwe album ‚ÄòCliffs, Vultures And Cycles Of Death‚Äô gaat over de cyclus van leven en dood, en over de rol van gieren als aaseters binnen dat ecosysteem. Anthony Fiumara sprak haar voor GC‚Äôs Ecologiespecial in onze nieuwste editie.  (https://www.gonzocircus.com/blog/melissa-pons) 

Lees verder  (https://www.gonzocircus.com/blog/melissa-pons) 

¬† 

Labelreport: Ostinato Records  (https://www.gonzocircus.com/blog/label-report-ostinato-records) 

‚ÄòMuziek heeft de kracht om het beeld te veranderen dat mensen hebben van de wereld, van geschiedenis, van het heden en de toekomst.‚Äô Een uitspraak van Ostinato Records‚Äô oprichter Vik Sohonie die goed zou kunnen functioneren als beginselverklaring van het label. In acht jaar tijd heeft Vik Sohonie, gedreven door journalistieke nieuwsgierigheid, muziek uit drie werelddelen opgeduikeld en uitgebracht, met muziek uit landen als Somali√´, Soedan en Ha√Øti. ‚ÄòIk wilde iets laten zien van de muziek die er klonk voordat ze wegzonken in een gewelddadige chaos,‚Äô vertelt hij in een interview aan Ren√© van Peer. Lees gratis op onze website het online addendum, met besproken onderwerpen waarover je niet in het papieren tijdschrift hebt gelezen!  (https://www.gonzocircus.com/blog/label-report-ostinato-records) 

Lees verder  (https://www.gonzocircus.com/blog/label-report-ostinato-records) 

¬† 

Labelreport: Ostinato Records (deel 2)  (https://www.gonzocircus.com/blog/labelreport-ostinato-records-deel-2) 

‚ÄòMuziek heeft de kracht om het beeld te veranderen dat mensen hebben van de wereld, van geschiedenis, van het heden en de toekomst.‚Äô Een uitspraak van Ostinato Records‚Äô oprichter Vik Sohonie die goed zou kunnen functioneren als beginselverklaring van het label. In acht jaar tijd heeft Vik Sohonie, gedreven door journalistieke nieuwsgierigheid, muziek uit drie werelddelen opgeduikeld en uitgebracht, met muziek uit landen als Somali√´, Soedan en Ha√Øti. ‚ÄòIk wilde iets laten zien van de muziek die er klonk voordat ze wegzonken in een gewelddadige chaos,‚Äô vertelt hij in een interview aan Ren√© van Peer. Lees gratis op onze website het online addendum, met besproken onderwerpen waarover je niet in het papieren tijdschrift hebt gelezen!  (https://www.gonzocircus.com/blog/labelreport-ostinato-records-deel-2) 

Lees verder  (https://www.gonzocircus.com/blog/labelreport-ostinato-records-deel-2) 

¬† 

Nieuw op de blog 

Conflux Festival 2024: Symbiotic Realities 

In haar derde jaar toont Conflux meer dan ooit een belangrijke aanwinst te zijn, niet enkel voor de stad Rotterdam, maar voor de muziekwereld in het algemeen. Het festival bracht een mengelmoes van drone-y soundscapes en innovatieve digitale kunst naar Rotterdam. De inspirerende kruisbestuiving van de twee nodigde uit om buiten bestaande lijntjes te denken, ervaren en voelen. Hasret Emine was erbij en schreef over hun bevindingen. 

Lees verder  (https://www.gonzocircus.com/recensies/conflux-festival-2024-symbiotic-realities) 

10 nieuwe Ex-songs: De diepgang van de veteraan ontmoet het vuur van de debutant 

Afgelopen voorjaar ging The Ex voor het eerst sinds 2019 weer op tournee. Niet om een nieuwe plaat te verkopen, maar om het publiek kennis te laten maken met nieuwe muziek en die stukken bij te schaven totdat ze rijp zijn om opgenomen te worden. 
Niet voor niets opent zanger-gitarist Arnold de Boer het concert in Paradiso deze woensdag met de woorden: ,,We hebben tien nieuwe nummers en die komen √©√©n voor √©√©n voorbij‚Ä¶‚Äô‚Äô Peter Bruyn was er namens Gonzo (circus) bij. 

Lees verder  (https://www.gonzocircus.com/recensies/10-nieuwe-ex-songs-de-diepgang-van-de-veteraan-ontmoet-het-vuur-van-de-debutant) 

Mind The Gap #169 

MTG#169 - (c) Janine Hendriks

Wat hebben kikkerkoren en Japanse noise met elkaar gemeen? Het antwoord daarop vind je op de nieuwe Mind The Gap. 

Als je maar lang genoeg luistert, krijgt verzengende noise dan niet een rustgevende uitwerking? En wat als er een mechaniek zou schuilen achter een kikkerkoor? De rode draad van deze editie is bovenal een aanhoudende en feestelijke kruisbestuiving tussen genres, artiesten en scenes.

To follow up, I do not know if it is related or which browser you normally use, but I wanted to add that you should only use Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox or Apple Safari browsers (all supported) when you use Promo Portal Admin.



In case you are using another browser (MS Edge for instance) it is not officially supported, and can cause a variety of strange issues.



Just FYI for the best results



Thanks

Erik Wood

Sony Music Promo Portal Admin Support
